column4: if you use ftp ip port to get into a ftp..how would you get a whole dir?
That's a weird question..... usually you'd use an FTP client, and hopefully it would support all the usual commands (ls, cd, etc...)
a friend is setting up apache...but he can't ftp into the box and upload the files cause it has it setup wrong
Your friend might FTP into the box, but he needs access to the /var/www dir...  It's a basic UNIX permission problem, from the sounds of it.
